      • findPiece

        public boolean findPiece(int[][] testBoard,
                int column,
                int player,
                int blankPieces)
        Tests whether a move made by the given player will result in a victory, with potential blank spaces for testing a player can get 3/4 pieces in a row
        Parameters:
        testBoard - the board used to test
        column - the tested move being made
        player - the player which is being tested for victory
        blankPieces - the number of blank spaces allowed
        Returns:
        true if a victory would occur, false if no victory.

      • testPiece

        public boolean testPiece(int[][] board,
                int column,
                int player,
                int blankPieces)
        Tests whether a player will win if a piece is placed above the next row or less with blank pieces
        Parameters:
        board - the board used to test
        column - the tested move being made
        player - the player which is being tested for victory
        blankPieces - the number of blank spaces allowed
        Returns:
        true if a victory would occur, false if no victory.

      • hasWon

        public boolean hasWon(int[][] boardState,
             int player)
        Checks for victory with a testing board for a player
        Parameters:
        boardState - the test board
        player - the player being tested
        Returns:
        true if a player would win, false if they don't

      • testForWin

        public boolean testForWin(int[][] board,
                 int player,
                 int blankPieces)
        Tests for a victory for a player with permitted blank spaces, used to stop 3/4 pieces or any double win condition strategies
        Parameters:
        board - the test board
        player - the player being tested
        blankPieces - the number of permitted blank spaces
        Returns:
        true if a victory is found, false if no victory found
